for_sales.sales_text: LUNE WHAMMEL, 1985, GRP HULL PAINTED, HAS FORE DECK WITH WASH BOARDS SO DRY BOAT TO SAIL,  REPLACED MAINSAIL 2024 WITH LUGSAIL HAS FURLING JIB ON SHORT BOWSPRIT. LONG SHALLOW KEEL 18 INCHES DRAFT AFT. COMES WITH AS NEW FRENCH BREAK BACK TRAILER & AS NEW MERCURY 3.5HP 4 STROKE OUTBOARD. VERY STABLE & SEA WORTHY DAY BOAT . DOUGLAS FIR MAST & WOODEN SPARS. BARN DOOR STYLE RUDDER WITH WOODEN TILLER & EXSTENSION ENABLING HELM TO SIT WELL FWD FOR BEATING TO WINDWARD. SAILS WELL ON ALL POINTS OF SAILING. VIEW SW SCOTLAND NEAR CASTLE DOUGLS, CAN DELIVER IN UK FOR FUEL COST. TEL:01556-660007 OR 07399552192.

boat.full_description: Early Bill Baily built GRP Lune whammel, with a lug sloop rig. Douglas fir 16 feet heavy mast, gunter spar, loose-footed main sail, short bowsprit, long shallow keel 19 inches aft, painted GRP hull, foredeck with washboards.
boat.name: AUK
